TopicTitle: KSP craft files not working with RO

Articles.Content:
When I hopped onto ksp, I installed some craft files, opened my save and opened the VAB. I looked for the craft file, but failed to find it. This has happened to me earlier, but I ignored it. You can ask me if you need my gamedata directory.

7 minutes ago, Cracky2479 said:

When I hopped onto ksp, I installed some craft files, opened my save and opened the VAB. I looked for the craft file, but failed to find it. This has happened to me earlier, but I ignored it. You can ask me if you need my gamedata directory.

Im using 1.8.1 btw

It’s very hard to sugggest a possible cause when you’ve provided so little information. At a minimum, a list of all the mods you’re using would help as would information about what craft you’re trying to load; did you disable ‘show stock craft’ in the difficulty settings or move the craft file to the wrong folder (it should probably be in saves/your save/Ships/VAB or SPH)? Does it use parts from a mod you don’t have installed? The Craft Manager mod might help you identify those and what mods they’re from.

Follow the instructions in this link, it makes it much easier for others to help you:

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/83212-how-to-get-support-read-first/

On 1/28/2021 at 12:26 AM, jimmymcgoochie said:

It’s very hard to sugggest a possible cause when you’ve provided so little information. At a minimum, a list of all the mods you’re using would help as would information about what craft you’re trying to load; did you disable ‘show stock craft’ in the difficulty settings or move the craft file to the wrong folder (it should probably be in saves/your save/Ships/VAB or SPH)? Does it use parts from a mod you don’t have installed? The Craft Manager mod might help you identify those and what mods they’re from.

Follow the instructions in this link, it makes it much easier for others to help you:

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/83212-how-to-get-support-read-first/

 

I am in 1.8.1, and I am trying to laoad a SLS craft of the SLS basic parts pack. My mods are:

RealismOverhaul (and its requirements)

RSS

RSSVE

Space shuttle system

EVE

Kopernicus

RealPlume

Spice Launch System

Space Launch system parts pack

ShadowWorks

TundraSpaceCenter

I also have the craft searching thing
